Sentencas: A three-dimensional numerical model of a single solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) considering chromium poisoning on the cathode side has been developed to investigate the evolution of the SOFC performance over long-term operation.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The degradation model applied in the simulation describes the loss of the cathode electrochemical activity as a decrease in the active triple-phase boundary (TPB) length.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The calculations are conducted for two types of cell: lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM)/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ)/Ni-YSZ and LSM-YSZ/YSZ/Ni-YSZ.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Their electrode microstructures are acquired by imaging with a focused ion beam scanning-electron microscope (FIB-SEM).
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The simulation results qualitatively reproduce the trends of chromium poisoning reported in the literature.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It has been revealed that the performance degradation by chromium is primarily due to an increase in the cathode activation over potential.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, in the LSM-YSZ composite cathode, TPBs in the vicinity of the cathode electrolyte interface preferentially deteriorate, shifting the active reaction site towards the cathode surface.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This also results in an increase in the cathode ohmic loss associated with oxide ion conduction through the YSZ phase.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effects of the cell temperature, the partial pressure of steam at the chromium source, the cathode microstructure, and the cathode thickness on chromium poisoning are also discussed.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning in (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode: Three-dimensional simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell
